tool_description: No-Code caching layer for your Airtable DBs
name: AirCache
title: AirCache

api_list.name: Get Many
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get many records of your desire app and your desire table on it

api_list.name: Get One
api_list.description: Get one based on the record id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aircache.p.rapidapi.com/airtable/appxxxxxx/table1/record1xyz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aircache.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aircache.p.rapidapi.com/airtable/{workspace}/{table}/{record_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aircache.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
